name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Platform Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in **Cloud Engineering** and **DevOps**, I excel in leveraging **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** to build scalable and efficient infrastructure solutions. Proficient in **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **Ansible**, I streamline deployment processes and enhance system reliability. My background encompasses robust **Python** development for automating cloud operations and integrating advanced technologies into enterprise-grade platforms.  
I have successfully led teams in delivering high-performance solutions within the healthcare and financial sectors. My skill set includes a proven ability to drive collaboration, ensuring seamless communication and technical excellence across cross-functional teams. I am dedicated to adherence to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while cultivating a culture of continuous improvement and innovation.
